actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the duration-of-marriage requirements (and other special requirements) which are presently applicable in determining whether a person is the widow of an insured individual for benefit purposes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Eliminates the duration-of-marriage requirements which are presently applicable in determining whether a person is the widow of an insured individual for benefit purposes under title II of the Social Security Act (Old-Age, Survivors', and Disability Insurance).

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the duration-of-marriage requirements (and other special requirements) which are presently applicable in determining whether a person is the widow of an insured individual for benefit purposes.
